thread.title: Ovation Music & Studios, Inc. Acquires Knoxville Vintage Gu
thread.title_full: Ovation Music & Studios, Inc. Acquires Knoxville Vintage Gu

author: Ovation Music & Studios, Inc.
title: Ovation Music & Studios, Inc. Acquires Knoxville Vintage Gu
text:
BOCA RATON, Florida , October 8,   Ovation Music & Studios, Inc. (OTC: OVMS) (the "Company") announces today that it has acquired Blue Rain Studios, Inc. of Knoxville, Tennessee as part of their growth strategy.
In August 2015 , Ovation Music & Studios, http://ovationmusicstudios.com/index.php , worked out an acquisition with Blue Rain Studios of Knoxville, TN , as part of series of steps to broaden its business base and enter the Nashville, TN market.  Blue Rain Studios, Inc. has been operating in the Knoxville, TN market since 2005.  
The Company has put forth a plan to acquire or partner with opportunities in music instrument and electronics to offer their customers more diverse product lines, and this opportunity in the vintage market fits the model.
About Ovation Music & Studios, Inc .
Ovation Music & Studios, Inc. is a music education company that provides individual and group lessons, rehearsal studios, professional recording studios, and live performances with its Rock Shop™ and Jazz Jam™ ensembles. Ovation Music & Studios is developed for students of all ages. Their unique method provides professional musicians and teachers in one-to-one voice and instrument lessons.  When the students have developed skill in the instrument as well as in music theory and ear training they are combined into rock bands and/or jazz ensembles which perform in public venues.
